body:
Day 12 - Manga 271*
Didn't really like the art style but overall it wasn't bad. Also came looking for rape but the author seemed to want to fill more pages before addressing what was described on the cover. 4/10.
Hmm I guess the Evangelion really is over? Anyways it was bad 3/10
